LanguageData.Miho_BasicFactory.label: Miho Basic Industry
LanguageData.Miho_BasicFactory.description: Basic technology to produce the ceramic.
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyFactory.label: Miho Heavy Industry
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyFactory.description: Weapons, Armors, Drones... we can mass produce anything.
LanguageData.Miho_MechHack.label: Mechanite Hacking
LanguageData.Miho_MechHack.description: Learn the technology to hack tiny mechanoids, almost invisible to the eye. Viruses can also be considered biological mechanites. The main purpose of this technology is to modify Miho's psychic serum.
LanguageData.Miho_MechCore.label: Heavy Mechanite Core
LanguageData.Miho_MechCore.description: Develop technology to create a core that allows perfect mechanite circulation.
LanguageData.Miho_Persona.label: Orchestrated objective reduction Theory
LanguageData.Miho_Persona.description: Learn the technology to embed a quantum soul into a mechanical device.
LanguageData.Miho_Celestial.label: Transcendental Mass Weaving
LanguageData.Miho_Celestial.description: Huge alloy production plant supported with persona AI. Huge alloy production plant supported with persona AI. Allows the creation of Celestial Scales by alloying the core of a neutron star with exotic materials.
LanguageData.Miho_Drone.label: Miho Basic Mechanoid
LanguageData.Miho_GuardDrone.label: Miho Turret Mechanoid
LanguageData.Miho_GuardDrone.description: Technology to connect mechanoids and turrets.
LanguageData.Miho_LightWarDrone.label: Miho War Mechanoid
LanguageData.Miho_LightWarDrone.description: Technology to develop mechanoids used in full-scale warfare.
LanguageData.Miho_CommandDrone.label: Psybase Drone
LanguageData.Miho_CommandDrone.description: Technology to develop mechanoids integrated with psychic abilities.
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarDrone.label: Miho Heavy War Mechanoid
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarDrone.description: Develop mechanoids that can serve as light tanks.
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarBattery.label: Mechanoid Artillery Battery
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarBattery.description: Develop mechanoids equipped with cluster artillery batteries.
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyPlasma.label: Infantry Joint Operations
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon.label: Miho Weapon
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon.description: Can produce simple weapons for the Miho.
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWeapon.label: Miho Precision Weapon
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWeapon.description: Can produce precision weapons for the Miho.
LanguageData.Miho_PlasmaWeapon.label: Miho Plasma Weapon
LanguageData.Miho_PlasmaWeapon.description: Can produce weapons for the Miho that utilize plasma state elements.
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelBasic.label: Miho Culture
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAdvanced.label: Miho Advanced Clothing
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAdvanced.description: Can produce complex clothing for the Miho.
LanguageData.Miho_Silk.label: Ebonsilk
LanguageData.Miho_Silk.description: Can produce silk that is soft and heat-resistant.
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelEltex.label: Miho Eltex Clothing
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelEltex.description: Can produce Eltex clothing that enhances psychic abilities.
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAssassin.label: Miho Assassin Clothing
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAssassin.description: Can produce assassin clothing that enhances physical abilities.
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelSorcerees.label: Miho Sorcerees Clothing
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelSorcerees.description: Can produce sorcerees clothing that enhances mechanite-magic abilities.
LanguageData.Miho_VerminControlWeapon.label: Vermin Control
LanguageData.Miho_VerminControlWeapon.description: As always, the ugly and useless animals were Vermin. There is a good weapon to kill such friends.
